title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and server for running large language models locally (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc.) with a simple pull/run workflow.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK that wraps the Ollama REST API for easy integration into Python apps.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers to talk to the local Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter that adds Ollama models as LLM and chat components for chains, agents, RAG, etc.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama with multi-model chats, code highlighting, RAG uploads.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library providing typed wrappers for the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for integrating local Ollama models into Ruby/Rails apps.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced command-line tool built on the official binary that adds conversation history, prompts library, and theming.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into the editor as inline Copilot suggestions.

title: ollama-hub
summary: Community-curated registry of Modelfiles, prompt templates, and LoRA adapters for Ollama.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri-based desktop GUI for macOS/Windows/Linux to manage and chat with Ollama models.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image and docker-compose stacks for CPU & GPU (CUDA/ROCm) deployments.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling, PVC, and optional GPU node-selector.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + llama.cpp for vector search and local Q&A.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command for private or channel-wide LLM interactions.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component template that connects to Ollama for rapid prototyping of local LLM apps.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing JavaScript/TypeScript bindings for the Ollama API.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package for Python developers to integrate Ollama models into scripts or services.

title: r/ollama
summary: Active subreddit for announcements, troubleshooting, and sharing projects around the Ollama ecosystem.
